Class Camera

java.lang.Object
com.soulfiremc.server.renderer.Camera
public final class Camera extends Object
Represents a camera in 3D space with position, rotation, and projection settings. Pre-computes direction vectors for efficient ray generation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Camera(net.minecraft.world.phys.Vec3 eyePos, float yRot, float xRot, int width, int height, double fov)
    Creates a camera from position, rotation, and viewport settings.

  • Constructor Details

    • Camera

      public Camera(net.minecraft.world.phys.Vec3 eyePos, float yRot, float xRot, int width, int height, double fov)
      Creates a camera from position, rotation, and viewport settings.
      Parameters:
      eyePos - The eye position in world coordinates
      yRot - Yaw rotation in degrees (0 = south, 90 = west)
      xRot - Pitch rotation in degrees (-90 = up, 90 = down)
      width - Viewport width in pixels
      height - Viewport height in pixels
      fov - Field of view in degrees
